titleStmt.title: A discovery of divine mysteries, or, The nature and efficacy of the soul of man considered in all its faculties, operations and divine perfections, and how it governs in divine and secular affairs of life ... with many other curious matters : being a compleat body of divine and moral philosophy / by C.B., D.D., Fellow of the Royal Society.
titleStmt.author: C. B., D.D.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A moral essay upon the soul of man.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
